channel.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here
channel.description:
[center][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/logo.png[/img][/center] [center] Revision-X features new items, abilities, maps, NPC's, and more. We have gone to great lengths to provide the best quality content possible for our players. We guarantee you will have never played a server quite like this one. [/center]
[center][b][u]LINKS[/u][/b][/center] [center] [url=http://revisionx.org/index.html]Home[/url]
[url=http://revisionx.org/client.html]Webclient[/url]
[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Revision-X%20client.zip]Download[/url]
[/center]
[center][b][u]FEATURES[/u][/b][/center] [center] • Never before seen custom home • Newest items • Newest interfaces • Custom Maps • Nearly all skills working • Over 15 bosses, some need teams! • Nearly all minigames! PC, Barb, Jad, CW • ::train area for easy combat training • Safe clan wars • Active staff & events • Undiscovered hidden easter eggs • Everyone can yell[/center]
[CENTER] [center][b][u]PICTURES[/u][/b][/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%201.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%202.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2012.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%203.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%207.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2011.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2013.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2014.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%205.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%209.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%208.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2010.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2015.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Ad/Ad%2016.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

never say most unique, best, ect. Your going to get trolled and flamed… alot.

Read full topic
item.source: Revision-X: The most unique server here
